TEXT.S: Xiao Zhan kawas tay 1991, ryax sa tay 5 nqu tay 10, Xiao Zhan, squliq na Cyukoku'. qyanux na sraral Xiao Zhan minkahul Chongqing, Sichuan na Cyukoku. pinqbaqan nya Xiao Zhan, t'aring kawas tay 2009 tehuk kawas tay 2013, mqwas biru sa Chongqing kinbaqan na kinbahan pqwsan biru krahu. qnxan nya mintzyuwaw nya Xiao Zhan hiya ga m'engi. Xiao Zhan ima pincyuwagan nya zyuwaw ga (2019) ru (2021)
